title: To understand autism, don't look away
description: Carina Morillo knew almost nothing about autism when her son Ivan was diagnosed -- only that he didn't speak or respond to words, and that she had to find other ways to connect with him. She shares how she learned to help her son thrive by being curious along with him. (In Spanish with English subtitles)
author: Carina Morillo
keywords: TED, talks, TED en Español, children, Autism spectrum disorder, communication, personal growth, social change, family, TEDx, parenting, art
